name: Flaming Chili Sauce
description: Upon use, increases all allies' SPD by 8% and their ATK by 15% for the next battle.
story:
A chili sauce crafted by a renowned chefhealer, known for its ability to warm the stomach even in the harshest cold. Its fiery flavor is so irresistible, it's to die for â€” figuratively, of course. 
However, the creator cheekily claims that its most effective "medical benefit" is curing those who boast about being "immune to spiciness."

"Hashafasasha... Not spicy at all! I am serious! This ain't spicy at all!"
